title: Director of Engineering, Software (Caper.ai)

pay_input_ranges.title: CA, NY, CT, NJ
pay_input_ranges.blurb:
Instacart provides highly market-competitive compensation and benefits in each location where our employees work. This role is remote and the base pay range for a successful candidate is dependent on their permanent work location. Please review our Flex First remote work policy here.

Offers may vary based on many factors, such as candidate experience and skills required for the role. Additionally, this role is eligible for a new hire equity grant as well as annual refresh grants. Please read more about our benefits offerings here.

For US based candidates, the base pay ranges for a successful candidate are listed below.

pay_input_ranges.title: OR, DE, ME, MA, MD, NH, RI, VT, DC, PA, VA, CO, TX, IL, HI

content:
We're transforming the grocery industry
At Instacart, we invite the world to share love through food because we believe everyone should have access to the food they love and more time to enjoy it together. Where others see a simple need for grocery delivery, we see exciting complexity and endless opportunity to serve the varied needs of our community. We work to deliver an essential service that customers rely on to get their groceries and household goods, while also offering safe and flexible earnings opportunities to Instacart Personal Shoppers.
Instacart has become a lifeline for millions of people, and weâ€™re building the team to help push our shopping cart forward. If youâ€™re ready to do the best work of your life, come join our table.
Instacart is a Flex First team 
Thereâ€™s no one-size fits all approach to how we do our best work. Our employees have the flexibility to choose where they do their best workâ€”whether itâ€™s from home, an office, or your favorite coffee shopâ€”while staying connected and building community through regular in-person events. Learn more about our flexible approach to where we work.Overview
About the Role 
As the Head of Software for Caper, you own the software systems for Caper carts end-to-end. The scope ranges from mobile, frontend, backend, infra, and IoT and all AI integration points. You support a talented group of engineers and engineering leaders across software and QA. You are responsible for the vision, execution, and deployment of all software. Instacartâ€™s goal has always been to support grocers and give retailers of all sizes an edge in an increasingly competitive industry while creating a seamless experience for customers and shoppers. With Caper.ai, we bring together online and offline shopping to create an entirely new in-store shopping experience for both customers and Instacart shoppers alike.
To be successful in this role, you should have extensive experience running software engineering teams, be technically deep, solve problems resourcefully and creatively, and adapt your process and styles to the changing needs of our evolution from small to enterprise-grade. 
 
About the Team
Caper.ai is a subsidiary of Instacart and an AI company. It leverages cutting-edge AI and computer vision technology to bring an autonomous shopping experience to the store. 
Its product, the Caper Cart - an AI-powered smart cart equipped with scales, sensors, touchscreens, and computer vision technology, is the cornerstone of the Instacart Platform Connected Stores initiative.  
Caper builds smart shopping carts powered by deep learning and computer vision to enable a seamless grab-and-go retail experience. Caperâ€™s unique technology is a plug-and-play solution that does not require retail store renovation, operational overhaul, heavy computing, and endless image labeling & training. Retailers purchase intelligent shopping carts, and the entire store is upgraded with cashier-less capabilities!
Caper is one of the fastest-growing retail automation technology products in the market, costs less than 1% of our competitionâ€™s infrastructure, and is already widely adopted in the marketplace. Our cross-functional and durable Product team solves hard customer & business problems in ways our customers love.
 
About the Job
You will:
Act as the Head of Software Engineering in a fast-paced, hyper-growth startup company. 
Support overall company vision and drive business results.  
Drive all software development, QA, and deployment end-to-end across mobile, frontend, backend, infra (including the nuanced areas such as CI/CD, data engineering, and demo infrastructure), and IoT. 
Deeply involved in hardware (the shopping cart) and computer vision/AI development 
Hire and develop the best talents in the organization and evolve them towards the rapid growth of the business. 
Define and carry out the technical and product vision and tie them back into the company vision.
Collaborate across departments to deliver results: product, design, enterprise solutions, logistics and operations, data science, product, and more. 
Create processes and evolve the team's operations to adapt to the growth of the business and organization. 
 
About You
Minimum Qualifications
5+ years of engineering management experience and 8+ years of software engineering experience. 
Have a proven track record of sound business and technical judgment, backed by strong decisions and results that you and your team drove. 
Scrappy, resourceful, and versatile. 
Have prior experience scaling a team to at least 50+ and being successful in managing managers of managers. 
Excellent communication skills/experience working with multi-disciplinary teams
Experience in shipping zero-to-one products
Have experience in at least three areas: frontend, backend, mobile, infra, computer vision, and Internet of Things (IoT). 
Prior exposure to consumer electronics or robotics products. 
Preferred Qualifications
Prior founder or Head of Engineering for consumer or enterprise software companies. 
Have prior experience working on zero-to-one products and scaling a product and team from scratch.
Instacart provides highly market-competitive compensation and benefits in each location where our employees work. This role is remote and the base pay range for a successful candidate is dependent on their permanent work location. Please review our Flex First remote work policy here.
Offers may vary based on many factors, such as candidate experience and skills required for the role. Additionally, this role is eligible for a new hire equity grant as well as annual refresh grants. Please read more about our benefits offerings here. For US based candidates, the base pay ranges for a successful candidate are listed below.CA, NY, CT, NJ$293,000â€”$325,000 USDWA$281,000â€”$312,000 USDOR, DE, ME, MA, MD, NH, RI, VT, DC, PA, VA, CO, TX, IL, HI$269,000â€”$299,000 USDAll other states$243,000â€”$270,000 USD

demographic_questions.description:
At Instacart, we like to think of ourselves as a potluck—where everyone brings something new, different, and flavorful to the table. We believe our team’s wide range of perspectives, experiences and backgrounds enable us to build a better product for our customers. Instacart is for everyone, and we’re committed to fostering diverse and inclusive teams that reflect the communities we serve.

Individuals seeking employment at Instacart are considered without regards to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other protected characteristic. 

Please note: If you apply for more than one job, you will be asked to fill out the questionnaire for each application.  

Why are we asking?

In order to track our effectiveness in recruiting a wide range of talent, we invite all applicants to self-identify demographic information. Completion of the form is required as part of our standard application process - but disclosing your demographic information is optional. Any information that you do provide will be recorded and maintained in a confidential file.

Self-identification categories

  • Gender Identity: How a person identifies their gender, regardless of their gender assigned at birth. â€¨
  • LGBT2QIA+: An umbrella term for a range of sexual orientations and gender identities/expressions. Stands for “Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, Transgender, Two-Spirit, Queer, Intersex, and Asexual. The plus sign is meant to encompass all other identities that belong to this community.” 
  • Race/Ethnicity: A person’s racial, ethnic or origin identity. â€¨
  • Disability Status: A person’s physical or mental impairment which may limit one or more of their major life activities. Learn more here. â€¨
  • Military Service: A person who has spent time serving in any branch of the military (retired or active). Learn more here. â€¨
